obr.DecidableClassCheck

Uses of DecidableClassCheck in obr
 

Classes in obr that implement DecidableClassCheck
 class AtomicHypothesisCheck
          Checks if all rules in the GRD or in one of its strongly connected components satisfy the atomic-hypothesis property.
 class DisconnectedCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the disconnected property.
I.e., if all rules have a frontier of size 0.
 class DomainRestrictedCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the domain-restricted property.
 class FrontierGuardedCheck
           
 class FrontierOneCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the frontier-1 property.
I.e., if all rules have a frontier of size 1.
 class GuardedCheck
           
 class RangeRestrictedCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the range-restricted property.
I.e., if there is no existential variables.
 class StickyCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the stickiness property.
 class WeaklyAcyclicCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the weakly-acyclic property.
 class WeaklyStickyCheck
          Checks if a set of rules satisfies the weakly-stickiness property.
